website_summaries.verdict: If you have your heart set on an artificial pre-lit Christmas tree that could easily be mistaken for the real thing, this one is worth the investment.
pros: Pre-lit branches cut down on decorating time
Branches earn praise for looking realistic and full
Tree is easy to put up and take down
cons: A tree with built-in lights has a downside – bulbs occasionally burn out and can be difficult to replace

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the pictures below the tree I received is nothing like the tree advertised. I am truly disappointed in this product and would like a refund due to the false advertisement. It is such a disappointment after the excitement of seeing a beautiful tree and thinking you were going to surprise your family.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great tree
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I was reading the reviews on the tree. But the reviews were confusing because they went from one extreme to the other so I was a little skeptical about the bad reviews. I pulled the trigger a couple of days ago and the tree came on time. First thing I did was open the box to see if the branches were life like. I was very pleased when I open the box and the tree was very nice. Very easy to assemble lights all work the first time and I have it already set up. I highly recommend this tree to anybody else.
customer_reviews.author: duramax829

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad tree, just not a great tree. 6.5'
customer_reviews.text: This tree is not as full as the picture online and not as full as all my previous faux trees. I have downsized several times and now I'm at 6.5.' Still looking for the full trees I once had, just not as tall as before. It is lightweight, soft to the touch, easy to assemble and probably would be okay with decorations The lights have all worked fine for about the 2 weeks that I have had it up for testing. Still looking for a thicker, more dense tree. Thank you Amazon for Prime with free returns. Another reason not to buy from a seller without free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tree.  Just Take Your Time.
customer_reviews.text: How nice this tree looks is directly proportional to the amount of time you put into spreading the branches out. Take your time. Spread out a few branches. Have some hot chocolate. Spread out a few more branches. Listen to some Christmas music. Spread out a few more branches. Make yourself a turkey sandwich with Thanksgiving leftovers. Spread out a few more branches. Take a nap. Finish up with the last few branches. Apply decorations and enjoy your tree..
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this tree are extremely deceiving. The tree isn’t nearly as full as pictured and all of the branches are the real look. DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY. No the picture attached isn’t fully fluffed. But you will never achieve what the original picture shows with this tree. No where near the branches you’d need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Replacement for the Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: This tree is better than the previous one we had. The branches look more real, but other than that it is fairly similar. The benefits of this tree are that it comes in 3 pieces. No putting each individual branch onto the "trunk". So it went up fast. It looked sickly at first, so we had to bend some branches to get it to all look right. Looks great now. Nice and full, green and very feastive. Good purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good tree
customer_reviews.text: The tree was very easy to assemble. It is much more realistic looking than a lot of trees that I have seen. The one thing I didn't like, was that even though I tried to space out the branches, there still appeared to be quite a few spots that you could see through to the pole. We were able to fill most of these spots with ornaments and ribbon, but I wish there weren't as many. That being said, I am probably being overly critical, because most of our company thought it was a real tree and complimented us on how nice it looked. Hence the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received this tree and am so much happier with it than I expected. Based on some of the negative reviews, I didn't really know what I would get. However, I'm happy to report that it looks great! Its a mix of the PVC and PE material which makes it look more real than other fake trees. I will say that it does require "fluffing" and spreading out the branches but once you take the time to do that, it looks like a classic Noble tree with enough spacing for ornaments without looking sparse. It also came with a good amount of replacement light bulbs which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with the top section of lights not working. ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the top section of lights not working. Not to mention the top section was wobbly and leaned over because it did not fit right. I wish that I could give this tree zero stars. Very unhappy and will never purchase anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights blowing
customer_reviews.text: I put it up the day it was delivered! The next day 7 bulbs on the top of the tree were blown. The next day 2 more were out! If this keeps happening, I will not have any replacement bulbs left. This is the 3rd tree we’ve had in 50 years, 1st one that is pre-lit. Other than the lights dying,the tree is well shaped, very pretty and life like. Thanks, Patricia Ellis
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to judge a purchase like this online but after doing a lot of research and reading reviews, we picked this tree. It is great! I watched the video mentioned on the instructions and it was not hard to do though the guy in the video makes it look even easier. Once together, it took two of us about 20 minutes to fluff it into shape and it looked great! I was so happy. The branches look full and it looks about as real as a fake tree can. The lights look great.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this tree. I had hoped foruch better. Directions don't specify what light ends to put together other than A into B. We had bottom lights for the longest time but couldn't find the plug ins for the rest. Finally found them and after trying different combinations got the whole tree to light up. However, found bare wires in a couple spots so had to use some electrical tape. Then a chunk of the branches came off toward the bottom of the tree. And now none of the lights are working. Ended up stringing lights on for this year. Don't waste your money on this particular tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the tree we paid almost $300 CAD for.
customer_reviews.text: We searched for quite a while for a tree and finally settled on this 6.5 fir with clear lights. When it arrived, and set it up, it measured roughly 5.5 ft. I am 6 ft tall and it is noticeably shorter than I am. We are beyond disappointed and worried it is going to cost us a fortune to ship back to the states.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product description is incomplete. Deceiving.  But tree is “ok.”
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 3 stars, since it’s not horrible, but I take a star off for the deception of saying the needles are the “feel real” type. The ones that are molded to look like real needles. I estimate that only about 1/4 of the needles are the type as described in product description. The bulk of them are the flat, confetti type. Only the tips of the branches have a cluster of “real” needles. The bulk of each Branch is just cheap flat needles. Deception. I do not appreciate that. No time to return with Xmas only 2 weeks away.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tree would only be more perfect if the stand were taller, so I could fit more gifts under it... Also, if the "trunk" were painted/designed to look like wood, like a real tree. I love it otherwise. It fits perfectly within my 8' ceiling living room. It's broad at the base, like a real tree. It took me approximately 2 hours total to unbox it (for the first time), set it up, fluff it, add garland/ornaments, and enjoy it's appearance with some wine. It's also VERY bright. Could see it THROUGH my kitchen window, through the dining room, and on the OTHER side of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Too many white lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: While this is over all a nice tree, the number of white lights make it almost impossible to see the ornaments. I've looked at it in the day time and at night and all I can see are the lights. They either need to use colored lights or really reduce the overall number of white lights. It doesn't matter what color decoration I use, you just can't really see it because of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bice

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a high quality tree
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree! I am skeptical about artificial trees but this one is awesome. Picture included shows the tree after about an hour of fluffing. It does take work initially to get the branches positioned to look full but it’s worth it. I still probably have a few adjustments to make with the branch placement but that’s for another day. 6.5 feet is the perfect height if you have 8 foot ceilings. Love how realistic the outer branches look.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Tree has to many gaps!!! Not full like picture shows!!
customer_reviews.text: The tree is not full like picture shows and I hate big ugly gaps in a tree!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bjfaith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! And very easy to assemble and all the lights work. The trick to making it look realistic is FLUFF out the branches in each section before adding the next section. The needles are soft and do not hurt your hands, like other trees I've had. Even my sister-in-law liked it, and she is very adamant about having a real tree.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This tree is REAL-LIKE in every essence!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is by far the best artificial tree we’ve had! Our prior tree of 15 years was a noble fir—loved this tree, too, but we now prefer the Douglas Fir! We lived an hour from the Sierra Nevada Mountains and this tree reminds us of our home. We moved recently retired from this area. It is real-life and sturdy with easy assembly! Thank you, Amazon, in offering this selection!
customer_reviews.author: Good Life Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great tree for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and looked at many artificial trees before deciding to buy one. I like a tree that isn't super full, but not bare either. This tree is a little more full than I am used to, but it's beautiful! All of the lights work, the feel real tips look great, and I'm thankful that I bought it. It's worth the money and less than I found a similar tree at any other store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF ORDERING A TREE ON LINE; LIGHTS NEED TO BE TESTED.
customer_reviews.text: THE THREE SECTIONS FIT EASILY TOGETHER, BUT THE LIGHTS ON THE SECOND AND TOP SECTION DID NOT WORK. THE ASSEMBLAGE REQUIRED SPLICING THE SECOND TIER WIRE BECAUSE WIRE NEAR THE PLUG WAS CUT. IF ONE BULB BURNS, THE ENTIRE STRING DOES NOT LIGHT! THAT WAS THE PROBLEM WITH ONE STRING ON THE TOP TIER. THE LOW RATING IS DUE TO THE LIGHT PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: WHIPPOORWILLOW

customer_reviews.title: Middle section won't fit into bottom section.
customer_reviews.text: There are no directions for this except a few pictures. The stand went together fine, the first section of the tree, likewise. BUT the middle part will not fit into the bottom. Nobody to call. No assistance anywhere. Definitely sorry I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Dee

customer_reviews.title: lights broken and missing
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time or money. We received this tree on Dec 18th, thinking we had a few days to put it up and decorate. Half the lights were out. A few were broken, and some were just the sockets with no light bulbs in it. Now we have to return this tree, and may not get one shipped before Christmas. Very disappointed in the quality of this tree. Also, it is not as full as it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all branches made from same material
customer_reviews.text: Have not put up, purchased for next year. Thought it was all made of pre-formed branch tips,(from the pics) but some are the old bristle kind that sheds so bad. We will see next Christmas season whether it meets expectations, as I only peeked into the box when it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Davis

customer_reviews.title: Our first artificial tree.
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with this tree after we got it all set up and got the branches fluffed out. How good the tree looks definitely depends on how much time you spend on it. We spent about 30 minutes going through the branches. The one thing I don't like is the way the bottom branches droop down. next year we will tie them up a little. We bought the 6 1/2 ft tree and it seems right. Some reviews I read mentioned the tree being shorter. And the amount of lights is good!
customer_reviews.author: k. sanders

customer_reviews.title: Opinion - expected stand to be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: My expectation for the price was that the stand would be sturdier. I always load up my tree with ornaments and would be concerned about children and dogs. My new tree is fastened to a wood platform to ensure it will not fall over. Overall quite happy with the look (couple of open/blank spots) and operation of the tree. The Amazon description of the details and features could have been more elaborate. Had to try to compare with details on the mfg website and actually thought I was getting more features then I did. Overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this
customer_reviews.text: This tree is perfect! I was hesitant because of the price being so good but it meets the quality of our prior tree for half the price (our last tree was too tall once we moved). Easy set up, looks real, light weight and very full!! The branches are a mix of 2 types, I assume to keep the price down, but the ones that show the most are the most real ones so it doesn’t matter that a few on the inside are not as high quality.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared, broken when arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the pre-lit tree. Opened up the package and there was glass from a bulb that came out when we pulled the tree out. Once we discovered what the glass was from, we realized that a light bulb had pulled apart and completely was smashed causing a middle row of lights to be completely out and unusable with the green cord dangling. As we had already put together the tree, we couldn’t imagine having to repackage and return. Unhappy that this pre-lit tree was already broken by the time it had arrived during the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Kelton Macke

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 of tree lights not working at FOUR DAYS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product last week and put it together on Thanksgiving morning. By Monday morning (yes, four days later) when I turned it on part of it was already burned out. Which is ridiculous and frustrating on so many levels (I now have to take all the ornaments off and get another tree). Ugh! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So happy we purchased this tree - it is not only a value but looks beautiful! The branches are sturdy - the needles are strong - tree is full - just know this tree will last for several years!
customer_reviews.author: vdolese

customer_reviews.title: Pre-lit tree
customer_reviews.text: After assembling the Christmas tree and plugging in the lights a small section of lights did not work. I decided not to return the tree because of the hassle it would be and to add a string of lights, if necessary next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle T

customer_reviews.title: Life like tree.
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptic on buying this since I couldn’t feel the material of the tree. I feel I got what I wanted. Works great. Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Paul McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Not full “real feel” branches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tree because it was “real feel” and branches casted from real branches. Well here is what that means the 6-8” of the tips of each branch look real the rest of the tree is the regular artificial junk. Really disappointed and Amazon not standing behind product, just really let down...
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tree it sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is horrible. It looks nothing like a real tree. It is very cheap looking. I started to put it together and the very first section had 3 limbs or 1/3 of that section with no lights working. I am returning it tomorrow. Worst choice of tree there island
customer_reviews.author: Penny manchester

customer_reviews.title: Top section it’s very loose
customer_reviews.text: On the bottom of the tree the branches have side breaches and they just kept coming off. I had to use zip ties to hold it in place. The top part of the tree has a square attachment but it’s not snug fit. And the top of the tree moves all over the place had to tie the top part to the middle part so It can stop moving so much. If I had time to return it I would. I guess I’ll have to take the loss and use it like this then next year take my time.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tree
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this tree! We just wish it was a little taller but that's described in the size. We love it it looks real totally real. We are usually Fraser Fir people and this is the first fake tree that we've had in a long time and we are very pleased with it it's very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jumpin Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed that the branches were not as advertised, most of the tips on the branches are not the 'real feel' tips. Also tree is not as full as the picture. The tree seems sturdy but can only give 3 stars because it is not as the description says.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J Hogan

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: WOW WOW WOW WOW I can not say anything wrong about this product it is just absolutely beautiful. Takes a couple of hours to set up getting all the branches spread out, so if you have patience and time then you will have a beautiful tree.
customer_reviews.author: amy conn

customer_reviews.title: Not LED
customer_reviews.text: These are incandescent bulbs, not LED as some stated. All the lights go out when one is pulled.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: It is BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, natural looking tree. It took a while to “fluff it” but I’m a perfectionist. Pretty easy to assemble although if I had bothered to read the instructions it would have gone quicker. This tree is a great value, has interesting texture and tons of lights. I am really pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: BEST TREE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TREE! Our first artificial tree ever and we are very pleased with the quality and ease! No more needles on the floor, or having to water the tree, not to mention no more cleanup! This is very realistic looking. Easy to put up and take down. Prelit so no hassles of stringing lights. Should have done this years ago! Save a tree! We shopped around a LOT and found this the best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Emmamom

customer_reviews.title: It still takes a lot of work.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because I did not care for the appearance. I really liked the look of my 25 year old tree that I was replacing. I was surprised that it still took a long time to expand all of the branches. I was advised to store it with a sheet over it rather than take down and put back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: mlk88

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This tree was a great buy. Setting up I thought the bottom of the tree could have been fuller. The middle and top portions look great but with decorations you don't notice the bottom. I am anxious to see how it does in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tree for the money. Caught it on a Lightening Deal. Perfect 6 1/2 foot shape, all the lights work and was easy to put together. Once the tree is decorated it's hard to tell it's not real. I can recommend this tree.
customer_reviews.author: GDF26

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TREE
customer_reviews.text: This tree is beautiful. Easy to assemble and when all the branches are straightened, the tree looks almost real. I already have it up. Only took one day for delivery. I would highly recommend this tree.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Fratus

customer_reviews.title: Really looks real!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first fake tree and I am so happy with this purchase. It really looks real!! I would recommend this tree to anyone looking for a tree that has realistic looking branches. The filler branches look fake but you can see those.
customer_reviews.author: Thezips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Artificial Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: As a person who always got a real pine tree for Christmas, I was a little hesitant to get an artificial one, but this tree is great. Once the prelit branches were in place and were "fanned" out, I was very happy to see what a full and beautiful tree it was. It definitely brought joy to our house this Christmas - and no needles to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confusing.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult and confusing trying to figure out which instructions belonged to your tree. Mine was defective in that only the bottom part lit up when connected.
customer_reviews.author: Cwal

customer_reviews.title: Nice tree but be CAREFUL of electrical shock
customer_reviews.text: Just received my tree. I was so excited to assemble it to see if it was a keeper. It seem to be a great tree that like all artificial trees needs a lot of fluffing. Unfortunately some lights on bottom portion of tree were not lit and I received a electrical shock from one of the bulbs. Sooooo I am NOT happy with National Tree's product testing and safety for their consumers. Don't know if I will re-purchase same tree.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice real look to it.
customer_reviews.text: Wished they offered this in a 7’. Good looking tree that looks real but wasn’t as full as I thought it would be for the price. Don’t get me wrong, it’s a beautiful tree but for the price it should be a little more fuller. There is some spots you can see through specificity where the sections adjoin.
customer_reviews.author: RollTide

customer_reviews.title: In todays market a good value
customer_reviews.text: Tree is sparse but can work around the gaps or should I say inside the gaps with ornaments was easy for me to put together and i have problems lifting so not real heavy The fluffing is strenuous but worth it to have a nice tree the lights are very bright someone broke my beautiful tree from last year which i would give an A plus and this tree well i would say a c plus
customer_reviews.author: Susan c Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Not as full as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: While this is a nice tree, it is definitely not as full as shown in the picture. After spending 3 hours fluffing and bending branches, the pole is still easily visible. There is not enough fill on the innermost part of the branches. There could be a few more real feel tips. It seems like they cheaped out a bit by mixing some of the flat paper needle tips on with the clusters of real feel Overall it is a decent tree but not one I would pay full price for
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Beautiful & sturdy. Full & Real Like. Easy to assemble. It’s my first artificial tree and I recommend everyone to save forests by buying a National brand tree.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsAffaire

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree, but section of lights failed almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: The tree was easy to assemble & initially looked terrific. 2 days after assembly & initial lighting, though, the top section of the tree's lights failed. I reached out to the manufacturer for product support immediately through their website, but haven't yet heard back. Fingers are crossed that they are responsive & we can get it figured out!
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love this tree
customer_reviews.text: This is my first fake tree. I never committed to getting one because I couldn’t handle how fake they looked and every real looking one at the store was nearly $500. This tree is AMAZING for the price. I’m never going back to real trees. It’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: imar0ckstar

customer_reviews.title: Great natural look
customer_reviews.text: Great natural look and the perfect fit for our room. Easy to assemble and the lights are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Giod
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is a great buy. I was worried about some of the reviews, but I do not believe they are valid. Yes there are two kinds of material used for the needles, but the good stuff is all you see and the fake looking needles are only on the inside as filler. The tree also can look nice and full as long as you take the time to fluff it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fedorczyk

customer_reviews.title: Christmas disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: This tree does not come as advertised. It is not full at all even after fully fluffed. I had to Strategically place ribbon and ornaments to hide holes. This tree was expensive so I expected a lot better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kalil

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tree, very full, so many lights. Photo online is nearly exactly what ours looks like after we fluffed the branches and tips.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: The set up on this tree was easy. It is a nice size. All the lights work. I think the tree this one replaced looked a bit more 'real' and needles felt less plastic-y, which is why I took off a star. When it is decorated and you step back a bit, this isn't something I notice.
customer_reviews.author: gendot

customer_reviews.title: Not as full as they show
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s still a pretty tree it does NOT look like the picture. It’s not even close to being as full as what they show.
customer_reviews.author: Moni Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Best fake you will see
customer_reviews.text: This is a best tree. It looks and feels real. No one knew that it was artificial and it had plenty of white lights. We should have done this years ago. The best part no pine needles to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the tree. Takes a bit of time to fluff it up the first time. Looks very real.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Beswetherick

customer_reviews.title: Would not advise anyone to buy this tree
customer_reviews.text: Tree was nothing like the picture. I counted only 300 lights instead of the 600. Tree not as full as picture shown.
customer_reviews.author: Leivory Logan

customer_reviews.title: Worst Tree Ever
customer_reviews.text: Total disappointment. Whole strings of lights that can't be coax on, anemic folliag, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negative reviews! This is a great tree!
customer_reviews.text: The photos from the top-rate, one-star review are completely inaccurate. This is a different tree from that one. Great tree for the price, paid $150 and this is a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t order this
customer_reviews.text: I worried about the review. And just decided to buy one because the recent costumer in 2019 told this is the right order like it describe. But it is not. YOu can see from the picture. Now I have to spend more time order the new one and return this . This is very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: nattaya worrakitpoonpol

customer_reviews.title: Great Tree for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great tree for the value. I was skeptical when I read some of the other reviews but I found the free to be full once assembled. It was even prettier once I added ornaments. You do have to spend time separating the branches to make it look full. I could have done more but felt this looked good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tree, good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great tree for the price. Out of the box took 5 min tops to easily assemble and about an hour to fluff. Comes with extra light bulbs and fuses.
customer_reviews.author: DrMomofmany

customer_reviews.title: NATIONAL CHRISTMAS TREE 6.5FT. W/
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN AMAZING TREE. EASY ASSEMBLY, PLUGINS, ETC. 🎄THE WHITE LIGHTS ARE EXTREMELY BRIGHT MY ORNAMENTS SPARKLE🎄MERRY CHRISTMAS
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY RIDGEWAY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, branches look real, lights didn't all work.
customer_reviews.text: Tree assembled quickly and easily, took the time to fluff the branches and it filled in nicely. Unfortunately, the top tier, only half of the lights worked. Tested all of the bulbs and can't seem to find the problem. It's not worth it to box up and send back, and hopefully we can figure out how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Badjar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: This is my first artificial tree in my life and it turned out beautiful. I wanted a tree that I could manage the weight of on my own. It was perfect and I would absolutely recommend this tree. My neighbor saw mine and went out and bought one for herself!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sparse
customer_reviews.text: This tree is very sparse and you can see through it when assembled. It appears that there are missing sections of branches throughout the tree especially the lower half. It does not look like the picture. Very disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kris A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tree! Would definitely recommend. Took some time to shape the tree the first time but was definitely worth it. No issues at all and lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great tree!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this tree. We normally get a real tree but decided this year (much to the dismay of my children )to get a fake tree. I was apprehensive opening the box as friends of mine had problems with a similar priced tree(not from amazon). Our tree was a pleasure to put together, and looks beautiful decorated. Pine dented candles took care of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very full!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree!! Great price and very full. Anyone that said it wasn’t full. They didn’t take the time to make it full. When My 12 year old tree died.I was so nervous to buy on line but my Christmas dreams came true with this tree!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Shea Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic tree Does not “feel real” Company will not refund money. Stuck with a very expensive piece of plastic crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the ugliest cheapest tree I have ever had and it’s not even what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Stevens-Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree! Once all the branches are spread out it's really full. The lights are so bright too! The only reason we gave 4/5 stars is because the top branch is very strong to hold our star.
customer_reviews.author: bacole08

customer_reviews.title: Love this tree
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this tree. Was hesitant about buying online but couldn’t find what I wanted in stores. I needed a 6 1/2 ft & all the store trees were really sparse. This tree is very full & has plenty of lights. It will take awhile getting the branches opened. Well worth the money & should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: We have always had a real tree so I was very anxious about purchasing an artificial tree. This tree looks great! Very very happy with how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri  L Rybak

customer_reviews.title: This tree is beautiful! Branches look real & the tree is really ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading the numerous reviews Amazon offered. This tree is beautiful! Branches look real & the tree is really full. I did watch the online video about opening the branches so that helped. This tree is a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen B Leonard

customer_reviews.title: wrong height
customer_reviews.text: not the size I ordered kind of bare but I put a lot of decorations to hide the gaps didn't look so bad after that
customer_reviews.author: Hootie

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tree for my daughter as a wedding gift. We assembled it decorated and took it down in one day. Two people were able to assemble, fluff, and decorate in about 45 minutes. It was beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up and breakdown. Quite Realistic looking.
customer_reviews.text: We were in need of a replacement for our 15 year-old tree and this fit the bill perfectly. Delivery was quicker than forecast.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Great Tree
customer_reviews.text: we have had this tree for a about a month and we LOVE it. It really looks real and was so easy to set up. All lights worked when I first set it up then the middle section went out. All I had to do was tighten up the connection and I was back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: Good economic tree.
customer_reviews.text: Tree definitely takes some extra fluffing to look "full". Cant get as full as the picture
customer_reviews.author: Kori William

customer_reviews.title: Only partially lit....
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tree, but there is a huge section in the middle with unlit lights. I’ve spent 45 mins trying to find a bulb that’s broken, I’ve changed the fuse in that string of lights. Nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Full and very lifelike. Friends and family thought it was a fresh tree! Good instructions and easy set up in about 20 minutes. Lots of lights and very well constructed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KateSD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tree! It needs fluffing when taken out of the box but it fills in nicely. Looks very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: ARService

customer_reviews.title: Not a 5 star tree
customer_reviews.text: This tree is a disappointment for the price. No matter how I adjust the branches, it's just not right. There could have been more lights and definitely fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mussell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. The lights are square ones- did't expect that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tree! Would buy again, but hope to get a few years out of this one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree! It looked as real as any fake tree I’ve ever seen. My 10-yo daughter and I put it up too. It was pretty easy - much easier than our previous, more expensive tree!
customer_reviews.author: max biscarr

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected. Great tree! Looks real, you just have to take the time to fluff out the branches properly.
customer_reviews.author: cm roz

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I just received this tree yesterday and it is beautiful! The feel of the tree is so real and it fluffs beautifully. I would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason hill

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! Avoid!!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures advertising the "real feel" look of this tree are outright false! It looks cheap, fake, thin and absolutely NOT the product advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Bonaker

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking tree!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased. Setup was easy. Tree is beautiful, although I wish it was a darker green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights were broken!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the tree. Other than the fact it came with the first two stands of lights being out. Wish we could get our money back.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful tree
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble - looks very much like the picture - branches are full and easily adjusted
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

product_meta.title: National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree, 6.5-FEET
product_meta.description: The Artificial Douglas Fir Christmas tree features a Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. Trimmed with pre-strung white lights this decorative tree with its hinged branch construction goes up fast, leaving more time for holiday cheer. Tree branches are pre-attached at the center pole using a hinge system with each branch lowered into position in preparation of final shaping. The fir tree decor is designed with a fire-resistant and non-allergenic material, making it a great accent piece wherever it is placed. A diameter of 49 inches at the base, it also includes a metal tree stand along with the assembly instructions. Decorations and ornaments are not included.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE SETUP AND STORAGE: Convenient hinged branches and pre-strung lights allow for easy setup and disassembly

NATURAL LIFELIKE APPEAL: This tree uses our trademarked 'FEEL REAL' technology that offers outstanding realism on 1,227 pre-lit branch tips These crush-resistant tips give our trees and greenery foliage that best mirrors nature’s design

LASTING DURABILITY: Built to endure many holidays with its sturdy metal base and 650 UL white lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out Our time-tested needles are fire resistant and non-allergenic
IDEAL SIZING: Tree stands 6 5 feet tall and 49 inches in diameter at the base For its most lush and full form, plan on taking 45-60 minutes to shape the tree

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: National Tree Company is a USA-based family owned and operated business established 60 years ago All of our products come with a limited 5 year warranty (2 year on lights) Our friendly USA customer service staff will assist with product and parts' questions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars406 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
